column4: oh wait.... I think I know what repositories I am missing, something about midubuntu or something? Can someone please jog my memory?
In Synaptic I am missing some of my favorite apps when I go to search, like "Limewire" and "Boxee" does anyone know what repository I might be missing that would have such apps?
you need to enable repo's for those projects
I don't recall enabling repositories for those specifically, I think they were included in some kind of general repository I added at some point in my last Linux install
